definition: to make an error

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
surname Cuo

sentences.english: I didn’t really realize what I haddone until later. I know what I did was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 直到後來才明白自己做了什麼，我知道做錯了。

sentences.english: On the big issues, slavery and the Union, the South was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 在奴隸制和聯邦政府這樣的大問題上，南方做錯了。

sentences.english: They couldn't sack me - I'd done nothing wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他們不能解僱我，我沒有做錯任何事情。

sentences.english: You didn't make anything wrong; you just followed your instinct.
sentences.chinese: 你沒有做錯什麼選擇，你只是順應着你的感覺阿。

sentences.english: Doing the job WRONG fourteen times gives you job security.
sentences.chinese: 連續十四次把工作做錯讓你保住工作。

sentences.english: At least she had the conscience to stand uop and realize what she'd done wrong.
sentences.chinese: 至少她還有良知，站出來，認識到自己做錯了。

sentences.english: I mean, what wrong did the Jews do in Spain?
sentences.chinese: 我說啊，猶太人在西班牙到底做錯了什麼？

sentences.english: What mistake did he make while waiting on God's promise?
sentences.chinese: 在等待神實現他的諾言，亞伯拉罕做錯了什麼事？

sentences.english: So, wrong is simply in doing wrong, not in getting caught.
sentences.chinese: 所以做錯了就是做錯了，而不在於有沒有被人發現。

sentences.english: So, wrong is simply in doing wrong, not in getting caught.
sentences.chinese: 所以做錯了就是做錯了，而不在於有沒有被人發現。

sentences.english: He asked for forgiveness of his wrong- doings.
sentences.chinese: 他爲自己做錯的事情請求寬恕。

sentences.english: Whenever you find your wrong-dOing, be quick with reparation!
sentences.chinese: 無論何時你發現自己做錯了，竭盡所能去彌補。

sentences.english: They, of course did a lot of wrongs.
sentences.chinese: 她們的確做錯了很多事。

sentences.english: Guo paid the judgment but refused to apologize or admit any wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 郭敬明支付了賠款但拒絕道歉或承認自己做錯了。

sentences.english: He disacknowledged that he had done wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他拒不承認自己做錯了。

definition: should not/to owe nothing
to admit an error/to acknowledge one's mistake
bad thing/misdeed/to ruin things
to blame/to rebuke
to err/to make a mistake/to do the wrong thing
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
as it should be by rights (idiom); proper and to be expected as a matter of course/inevitable and right
to excuse/to forgive/to pardon
to catch fire/to ignite/to detonate/to get angry
to explain/to justify/to defend (a point of view etc)/to provide an explanation/to try to defend oneself
to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
guilty conscience/to feel a twinge of guilt
incorrect/wrong/amiss/abnormal/queer
mistake/fault/responsibility (for a fault)
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
